targets.query: SELECT sum("Reads_persec") AS "Reads", sum("Writes_persec") AS "Writes" FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT sum("Reads_persec") + sum("Writes_persec") AS "Total" FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT sum("Reads_persec") + sum("Writes_persec") AS "Total" FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval)
SELECT mean("Read_Latency") FROM "cluster_csv_filesystem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("Avg._sec/Read") + mean("Avg._sec/Write") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)

SELECT sum("Cache_Size_-_Configured") FROM "cluster_csv_block_caching" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
